attributes.action: Scrap the 2012 London Olympic Games Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 2012 logo has made the country a laughing stock internationally, it's a misrepresentation of the great city of London and not only that, the animated Logo is an epileptic health risk. The designers should be forced to redesign the logo free of charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
